name: Christian Heidemeyer
description: Echometer is an online retrospective software tool and One-on-One Meeting software. It is the smartest way for busy IT Team Leads & Engineering Managers to improve their team’s delivery via interactive psychology-based retrospectives, 1:1 meetings, Health Checks and action tracking on autopilot.
